markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Access Lore](/Spells.aspx?ID=741)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 229 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Lore](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=7)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You sift through the multiverse's divine knowledge, seeking out tidbits related to a particular subject. Choose one [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) skill. You temporarily gain the same proficiency rank in that Lore skill as your proficiency rank for your oracle spellcasting.
name: Access Lore

summary_markdown: You sift through the multiverse's divine knowledge, seeking out tidbits related to a particular subject.
text: Access Lore Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 229 2.0 Mystery Lore Cast Single Action somatic Duration 1 minute --- You sift through the multiverse's divine knowledge, seeking out tidbits related to a particular subject. Choose one Lore skill. You temporarily gain the same proficiency rank in that Lore skill as your proficiency rank for your oracle spellcasting.
